div.div: WHAT TO EXPECT WHEN NO ONE'S EXPECTING

div.a: America's Fertility Rate Is Dropping: Why We Should Be Worried

div.div: The nation's falling fertility rate is the root cause of many of our problems. And it's only getting worse.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/14FY9Td&via=Digg&text=America's Fertility Rate Is Dropping: Why We Should Be Worried

div.a: How To Bet On The Super Bowl Without Getting Caught

div.div: There are plenty of quality offshore operations that are willing to take your bets and pay out your winnings. If you want to know how to bet on sports online—like, say, for the Super Bowl—we'll tell you.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Ue4DHb&via=Digg&text=How To Bet On The Super Bowl Without Getting Caught

div.div: DESERVE TIME OFF FOR GOOD BEHAVIOR

div.a: Inmates Swim Through Frigid Water To Save Stranded Boys

div.div: Prison inmates dove into frigid water to save three boys after their canoe capsized on Salmon Creek Wednesday afternoon.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WAhIso&via=Digg&text=Inmates Swim Through Frigid Water To Save Stranded Boys

div.a: 8 Government Conspiracy Theories (And How They Could Be Right)

div.div: Grab your tinfoil hats. It’s time to get paranoid.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UeUYQF&via=Digg&text=8 Government Conspiracy Theories (And How They Could Be Right)

div.div: NO WORSE PUNISHMENT THAN THE REAL WORLD

div.a: Cheating Harvard Students Sentenced To A 'Full-Time, Paid, Non-Academic' Job

div.div: Banished from the cushy ivory tower, scores of cheating Harvard students were sentenced to six months’ hard time in the real world before they can re-apply to the prestigious university.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11wqXsW&via=Digg&text=Cheating Harvard Students Sentenced To A 'Full-Time, Paid, Non-Academic' Job

div.a: The 6 Most Bizarre Things Ever Discovered In Space

div.div: Humanity has been looking out into space for thousands of years, and the most important thing we've discovered over that time is that everything is crazy weird out there, and it just keeps getting weirder.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VztC8m&via=Digg&text=The 6 Most Bizarre Things Ever Discovered In Space

div.a: Canada's Magical Ice Hotel Inspired By Jules Verne

div.div: The magical castle-like lodge is built each year with a new themed design out of hundred of thousands of tons of ice and snow.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12iCPDT&via=Digg&text=Canada's Magical Ice Hotel Inspired By Jules Verne

div.a: Weekend Promises A Stellar Shot Of The Moon

div.div: Gaze at the moon this weekend to see some marvelous views of major craters.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11uasCv&via=Digg&text=Weekend Promises A Stellar Shot Of The Moon

div.a: Eerily Cool Music Video Features MRI Scans Of A Singing Head

div.div: Musician Sivu spent two hours inside an MRI machine to film the music video for his song "Better Man Than He." The result is this hypnotic video, which lets us see what literally goes on in Sivu's head as he sings.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11ganD9&via=Digg&text=Eerily Cool Music Video Features MRI Scans Of A Singing Head

div.a: Top 10 Things Your Smartphone Sucks At (And How To Fix Them)

div.div: Sometimes, smartphones can be a boon for your personal productivity, but other times it's amazing how much trouble they have performing simple tasks. Here are ten things your phone probably sucks at, and how to make it work better.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UdQEB9&via=Digg&text=Top 10 Things Your Smartphone Sucks At (And How To Fix Them)

div.a: The Best Parenting App Is Against The Law

div.div: The Federal Trade Commission levied a $800,000 fine on the social networking service Path Friday morning for having, among other things, permitted children to use the service, a small social network meant for friends and family.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XYWJNh&via=Digg&text=The Best Parenting App Is Against The Law

div.a: This Periodic Table Imagines The Elements As People

div.div: A book by Japanese artist Benpei Yorifuji makes the many elements seem a little more individual by illustrating each one as as an anthropomorphic cartoon character, with distinctive hairstyles and clothes to help readers tell them apart.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11smaxw&via=Digg&text=This Periodic Table Imagines The Elements As People

div.a: How To Make Pulled Pork: A Guide For Unfussy Super Bowl Eaters

div.div: It's easy, it's phenomenally cheap, it requires about as few dishes and pots and pans as one could reasonably expect of any large-quantity cooking endeavor.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XxMIYq&via=Digg&text=How To Make Pulled Pork: A Guide For Unfussy Super Bowl Eaters

div.a: Why Don't Other Countries Like Football?

div.div: Why does the country's most popular sport -- perhaps its most popular form of entertainment of any kind -- excite so little attention outside the land where it was invented?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Tnt43b&via=Digg&text=Why Don't Other Countries Like Football?

div.a: Pig Out In The Winter Or When Money's Tight? Blame Evolution

div.div: When times are tough, that prehistoric urge to splurge on high-calorie treats like M&Ms still kicks in.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WZanky&via=Digg&text=Pig Out In The Winter Or When Money's Tight? Blame Evolution

div.a: DARPA's 1.8 Gigapixel Drone Camera Could See You Waving At It From 15,000 Feet

div.div: Word of DARPA's experimental 1.8-gigapixel surveillance video camera, ARGUS-IS, first surfaced in 2009. And now that they probably have something better hidden, more details continue to emerge. A PBS video got to look at the actual video feeds -- and they are stunning.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Yqd13U&via=Digg&text=DARPA's 1.8 Gigapixel Drone Camera Could See You Waving At It From 15,000 Feet

div.a: As Self-Immolations Near 100, Some Tibetans Ask, Is It Worth It?

div.div: Even as the self-immolations have become central to the Tibetan protest movement, a quiet debate has been under way among Tibetans who are anguished over the deaths of their young men and who question how the acts reconcile with Buddhist teachings.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XPfxxH&via=Digg&text=As Self-Immolations Near 100, Some Tibetans Ask, Is It Worth It?

div.div: THIS NAPKIN DRAWING EXPLAINS IT ALL

div.a: The End Of The Web, Search, And Computer As We Know It

div.div: People ask what the next web will be like, but there won’t be a next web. The space-based web we currently have will gradually be replaced by a time-based worldstream.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W4Wwtw&via=Digg&text=The End Of The Web, Search, And Computer As We Know It

div.a: Don't Worry, Astronauts On The ISS Will Get To Watch The Super Bowl Too

div.div: There are plenty of things you don't get to have when you're in space. Like gravity, for instance. Or normal food. But Super Bowl parties aren't on that list.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VEK5EL&via=Digg&text=Don't Worry, Astronauts On The ISS Will Get To Watch The Super Bowl Too

div.div: My current neurological deficiencies were precipitated by what now, in hindsight, increasingly feels like a psychological illness: I enjoyed the violence of football.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/118faql&via=Digg&text=How Football Battered My Brain

div.a: The Economics Of Netflix's $100 Million New Show

div.div: With Netflix's foray into original, high quality programming today, the streaming TV network wants to turn into the HBO of Internet TV, but can the network afford it?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12fUwUC&via=Digg&text=The Economics Of Netflix's $100 Million New Show

div.div: STATEN ISLAND CHUCK BEGS TO DIFFER
When the Pennsylvania groundhog emerged from his dwelling at Gobbler's Knob Saturday morning, he did not see his shadow.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UMk6fi&via=Digg&text=Punxsutawney Phil Predicts Early Spring

div.a: Eight Things You Didn’t Know About Groundhogs

div.div: Happy Groundhog Day! Today is the day each year in which we look towards a giant rodent to find out how much more winter we’ll have to endure. In honor of the holiday, here are eight things about groundhogs that you probably didn’t know.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YJEUYC&via=Digg&text=Eight Things You Didn’t Know About Groundhogs

div.a: When Taking Multiple Husbands Makes Sense

div.div: Historically, polyandry was much more common than we thought.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12eOcwD&via=Digg&text=When Taking Multiple Husbands Makes Sense

div.a: The Weirdest Craigslist Ads For Super Bowl Tickets

div.div: A Rolex, a snow-blower, and a round-trip vacation to Jamaica are just three of the things crazed football fans are willing to trade on Craigslist for tickets to Super Bowl XLVII.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Vy3j2o&via=Digg&text=The Weirdest Craigslist Ads For Super Bowl Tickets

div.a: Twitter Hacked This Week, Up To 250,000 Accounts May Have Been Compromised

div.div: It's been a rough week for security breaches, and Twitter has just announced it was a victim of attacks this week as well.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XZjPU7&via=Digg&text=Twitter Hacked This Week, Up To 250,000 Accounts May Have Been Compromised

div.div: YOU'VE ALWAYS GOT A SOURCE OF HEAT

In a station where astronauts might reside, the pressure would be around 0.6-0.7 bars, which means that a chef must contend with a lower boiling point, for instance. And deep-frying is a no-no: Volatile grease bubbles can glom on to instruments and muck things up.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XNVr74&via=Digg&text=How To Cook On Mars

div.a: Before Steve Jobs And Steve Wozniak Invented Apple, They Hacked Phones

div.div: You can spot Jobs’ all-consuming ambition, creative vision, and penchant for total control in his happy-go-lucky days of phone phreaking in the ’70s.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YIQRO0&via=Digg&text=Before Steve Jobs And Steve Wozniak Invented Apple, They Hacked Phones

div.a: Ran Out Of Condoms? This iPhone App Will Deliver Some To Your Door

div.div: Simply call up the app on your smartphone, select your desired pack, pay with credit or cash upon delivery, pin-drop you location and — voila — condoms are on the way, quickly, discreetly and anonymously.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VB2YIJ&via=Digg&text=Ran Out Of Condoms? This iPhone App Will Deliver Some To Your Door

div.a: A Brief History Of Nerds In Pop Culture

div.div: It’s time to cue up Huey Lewis’ “Hip to Be Square” and trace the approval rating of nerds in pop culture throughout the ages.
